tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She's an excellent gynac. My son was born in her hands. Had been to another gynac initially who had scared me  lot saying that there were complications. She put me onto some treatment.  This is when my mother in law asked me to visit Dr.Padmini.  she was such a consolation. Firstly she told me that my pregnancy was absolutely normal and I need no treatments. I had a normal delivery and very smooth pregnancy period also . Would never be able to thank her enough. So now, even for my silliest gynaecological problem, I visit only her. ***** *** ****

tags: None
review:
Dr Padmini mam is very calm and experienced doctor. She makes you feel so easy throughout the pregnancy, everything seems like very easy and normal with her.

Best part, unlike other money minded doctors, she prefers Normal Delivery and waits for appropriate time.

She doesn't write unnecessary test which now a days became a trend and sometimes it becomes very heavy to pockets and not everybody can afford those tests.

St. Marthas Hospital is highly recommendable because its connected with nature and have big rooms and washrooms , you will have an access to Corridor for walking.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We had just moved to Blr and visited Cloud Nine Jayanagar after a year long relationship with Cloud Nine in Pune. And unfortunately met the respected Dr. Padmini Isaac. She completely ignored all the previous records and ended up giving us the same medications and test that we had done before. After wasting 6 months of our time she has the audacity to say “I’m not a fertility expert. Come back to me when you get pregnant”. Seriously? Why didn’t she say this while looking at our records? * ***** **** ** *** ** * **** ******* *** she definitely isn’t an empathetic one. She has so many patients **** *** ******* **** ** ********** *** ******* ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would never recommend this doctor to anybody. first of all cloudnine being such big hospital should have a token system or a proper queue system. even after taking prior appointment they made us wait for more than one hour. After such a long wait, the doctor was least bothered to explain the issue. She was in such  haste and no empathy at all. Please do not consult her. Instead of Explaining what the issue was she just wrapped up and proceeded with the next patient saying I will explain in the next visit. Waiting for one hour, and got consulted for hardly five minutes. please do not go consult her. Myself  and my husband were very disappointed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted Dr. Padmini Issac, as I heard that she was the highly experienced doctor in Cloud Nine. It was my first pregnancy. She was not at all friendly...gave least importance to my questions...was always im a haste. *** ***** *** **** ** ******* *** **** ******* ********* She also never bothered to give us any pregnancy related tips. My scan went normal during my 6th week pregnancy. But during my 9th week scan, growth stopped & heartbeat was not detected...I suffered a missed miscarraige. She took least importance to explain me what went wrong. 
She did not give any guidance after my miscarraige. I would never ever recomment her to anyone in future.

I now regret for consulting her

tags: None
review: A gem. She handled the entire process  of my pregnancy through the delivery and post delivery issues like a pro. Since she's my family gynaec, I had the advantage of that extra faith and trust on her. Her witty answers will change the way you look at doctors these days. She will calm you down with her to the point replies. Blessed to have met her!

tags: None
review: I just pat on my back that i made a right choice to choose Dr.Padmini Issac. She has been wonderful and helped us throughout the pregnancy. Her funny replies to your 'stupid' question is admirable. It makes you feel that you have nothing to worry about.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very nice doctor. To the point and approachable. She made my pregnancy a peaceful journey by making me focus on right things. Love the warmth and concern that she offers on every visit, be it the greeting or counselling :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She is a 2 minutes doctor.. not even trying to listen what patient is telling..she should interact with patient more without knowing what patient is feeling* ***** **** *** *** *** ***** ****** but she has lot of experience.

tags: None
review: She made us feel comfortable and I love the way she welcomes us wit a smile and very experienced  which I need not even say. Am lucky to get treated by her.

review: It was good .she is very experienced and help us in a very mature and friendly way..I love to visit her in future as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: she doesn't want to hear to the patients prpblems & is a 2mins doctor... sometimes very rude & we had to change the doctor in my 20th week... not friendly & doesn't suggest anything from her end to the patient

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very very happy to have met dr.padmini Isaac,  she clarified my doubts. Thank you dr. For your guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: She is brilliant in her work...Thank god I decided to met her. She saved me from unnecessary and harmful medications given by other doctors in Bangalore. She starts from basic checks and step by step to find out the problem instead of unnecessary checks and operations in case of infertility.

tags: None
review:
Shes  , humble , on point advice , does not advice a lot of tests and stuff . Good planning . I would recommend her to a koṭ of women out there having problem to conceive or any such issues . 
I stay in mumbai , but I still want to get treated from her .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: The doctor didn’t inform us about important tests, vaccinations and medications during pregnancy. She went on a vacation for a month and didn’t inform us what tests/scans had to be carried out.  She didn’t inform me to take Tetanus vaccination. *** **** ****** ****** ** ***** ********* ********** **** *** ******** ** ** ***** ****** *** ****** We had to change the doctor in 20th week. She doesn’t like being asked lots of questions and doesn’t talk much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
She is very experienced, she talks less but important things. Doctor is very good but the service of cloudnine is very bad. The sisters are very lazy and not at all knowledgeable.
What is the use of appointment and booking time slots if anyhow we have to wait in queue. They take walk in patients too

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
Met doctor Padmini Isaac as I have irregular periods and PCOS.
My earlier Gynaecologist diagonised me with PCOS without taking any scan. I was on medication. Inspire of taking medicines my periods we're irregular. 
My friend referred me to Dr. Padmini, on meeting her she did my through checkup and asked me to take a scan and come back.
Her approach towards treatment was very satisfying. I got a feeling of satisfaction after meeting her. 
Hoping for the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am.extremely happy will visit again 
Thank you
Yet to get scan  once its done I can get complete chech up
